basic_info.description: ðŸ‘‹ I'm Daniel Shaby, a Senior Full Stack Engineer and UC Berkeley alumnus. I have over 5 years of experience with object-oriented programming, particularly with using frameworks and technologies such as React (NextJS, CRA, Vue), Javascript, Typescript, Node.js, MongoDB, and Express. I also have experience orchestrating application architecture, using technologies such as Docker, Kubernetes, AWS, CI/CD pipelines, microfrontend and microservices-based architecture. I'm flexible, curious, and open to learning other languages and technologies.

projects.title: Sourced Fashion Inc
projects.description: Built a large E-commerce site with React, Redux, JavaScript, Typescript, Google Firebase for authentication and database storage, Sass, Styled Components, CSS3, and more.

projects.title: David Chu's China Bistro
projects.description: Built a website for a restaurant based in Maryland using JavaScript, Google Maps APIs, Twitter Bootstrap, CSS3, HTML-5, and more.

projects.title: tindog
projects.description: Built a landing page for a startup idea that matches dog owners for friendships and partners for their dogs. This idea is based on tinder's relationship dating app. Coded with efficient CSS3 and Twitter Bootstrap, including mobile friendly and responsive designs.

projects.title: Explore popular spots
projects.description: Created a full-stack MERN web app (MongoDB, Express, React, & Node), which was deployed on two servers, Heroku and Firebase. Programmed the logic required for authentication with JWT token, Google Maps REST API Integration, security, file upload, CRUD functions, and persistent file storage (Amazon AWS S3)

projects.title: Monsters Rolodex
projects.description: Created a list of monsters/users with React, and with every keystroke, the website updates automatically filtering for users by the keyboard letters pressed. The users were imported with APIs, and the website was deployed on Firebase.Â

projects.title: Daily Blog
projects.description: Deployed a full-stack web app using MongoDB, Express.JS, Node.JS, and Boostrap. Create, Read, Update, and Delete (CRUD) functions were also implemented.

projects.title: Secrets
projects.description: Created a full-stack secure application with hashed and salted passwords. Only registered users can view the 'secrets'. Built with Node.js, Express, MongoDB and Twitter Bootstrap.

projects.title: Keeper App
projects.description: Built a full-stack web app with React, Material Boostrap, and CSS3 for the front-end and the Blockchain technology / Motoko for the backend.

projects.title: Simon Game
projects.description: Created a challenging JavaScript (and jQuery) built game based on the original Simon game.
